meanings.definition: A person with exceptional abilities or powers.
meanings.sent1: The superpersons saved the day with their incredible strength.
meanings.sent2: We admire superpersons for their extraordinary talents.
meanings.sent3: The superpersons at the party amazed everyone with their magical tricks.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, superpersons are like unstoppable forces.
meanings.sent5: The superpersons in the story had powers beyond imagination.

meanings.sent1: Look at all those superpersons gathered for the event.
meanings.sent2: The team of superpersons worked together to achieve greatness.
meanings.sent3: The superpersons in the comic book were a colorful bunch.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with laughter as the superpersons shared stories.
meanings.sent5: The superpersons stood out in the crowd with their unique costumes.
